replies.text: We have you staying in room {RoomNumber}.
replies.speak: We have you staying in room {RoomNumber}.

replies.text: Would you like to use the card we have on file?
replies.speak: Would you like to use the card we have on file?

replies.text: Ok, you're all checked in. Enjoy your stay!

replies.text: I've sent your information to the concierge desk to complete your check in with a new card.
